thumb.title: [MMD/SynthVカバー]しあわせレストラン/Nightmare Restaurant [Yi Xi]
thumb.description: ▶Music : 弌誠 (https://youtu.be/lIBZi9UEwh4?feature=shared) ▶UST : 藥狐 ▶Motion & Camera & PV : 下線 (https://youtu.be/SyL0LjcC1Ig?feature=shared) ▶Stage : @Ai ▶Accessory : キャベツ鉢, いつものほん ▶Effect : 角砂糖, そぼろ, 針金P, P.I.P, ミーフォ茜, データP, less., ikeno, くろくまの人, Rui, のりしお, akeru, ノン, 下っ腹P, 化身バレッタ ▶Stock video : Mr.磁石 ▶Character design : Vimalion Project (https://vimalion.pro/)
